import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from '../component-input.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-simple-table0', templateUrl: './simple-table0.component.html', styleUrls: ['./simple-table0.component.css'] }) export class SimpleTable0Component { @Input() userData: User[] = [] }
